channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta Taps Republican as New Head of Global Policy
item.description: Joel Kaplan is replacing former U.K. Deputy Prime Minister Nick Clegg as Silicon Valley prepares for the second Trump administration.

item.title: Analysis: Could Trump face another early setback in House speaker’s race?
Federal Court Strikes a Final Blow to FCC's Net-Neutrality Rules
item.description: Appeals-court decision ends effort to regulate internet providers like utilities, citing Supreme Court decision restraining federal agencies’ powers.

item.title: The House is voting for a speaker. Here’s what you need to know.
item.description: Speaker Mike Johnson (R-Louisiana) must persuade a handful of Republican lawmakers frustrated at his leadership to support him once again.

item.title: Biden: Trump’s tax and tariffs plans are a ‘major mistake’
item.description: Five weeks after the election, the president took his sharpest swing at Trump’s policy plans.

item.title: Trump voters feel very differently about things now that he’s won, our new poll shows

item.title: It’s still the economy: What TV ads tell us about each campaign’s closing message
item.description: The final paid messages: Economy, culture wars and character.

item.title: Apple Agrees to Pay $95 Million to Settle Lawsuit Over Recordings Tied to Siri
item.description: The class-action lawsuit alleged the company obtained private communications and shared them with third parties without consent through Siri.

item.title: Stephen Miran is Trump's pick to lead Council of Economic Advisers

item.title: Biden awards Liz Cheney a presidential medal for challenging Jan. 6 attack

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on CyberArk Software, Tesla, Kuaishou Technology and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Trump plans ‘victory rally’ at Washington arena day before inauguration
item.description: Get the latest news on the transition to the new administration of President-elect Donald Trump and a new Congress.

item.title: How Elon Musk Made the Las Vegas Bombing About His 'Badass Truck'
